name: Rename with contract references (Calor)
prompt:
In Rename.calr, rename the parameter `num` in the `ValidatedOp` function (f002) to `value`. This parameter is referenced in multiple contracts. Update ALL occurrences:
- Parameter declaration: §I{i32:num} -> §I{i32:value}
- First precondition: §Q (>= num 0) -> §Q (>= value 0)
- Second precondition: §Q (<= num max) -> §Q (<= value max)
- Return expression: §R num -> §R value

IMPORTANT: The function ID f002 must NOT change. The postcondition §S (<= result max) doesn't reference num, so it stays unchanged.
